Roger Thornhill.action: Looks down with tension on his face and exhorts Eve to keep trying despite the danger.
Roger Thornhill.assessment: This shows leadership and the ability to encourage others under pressure, indicating confidence and emotional control.

Roger Thornhill.action: Encourages Eve to keep trying to pull herself up despite her struggle.
Roger Thornhill.assessment: Roger shows supportive and encouraging behavior, demonstrating patience and kindness in helping Eve.

Roger Thornhill.action: Puts his arms around Eve and kisses her, showing affection.
Roger Thornhill.assessment: This physical gesture indicates warmth, intimacy, and a caring attitude toward Eve.

Roger Thornhill.action: Acknowledges the silliness of the situation but admits to being sentimental.
Roger Thornhill.assessment: This reveals a sincere and tender side of Roger, showing emotional openness and a gentle nature.

Roger Thornhill.action: Lifts Eve with difficulty to the upper berth of a train because the lower berth is not open.
Roger Thornhill.assessment: This action shows physical effort and determination, indicating a willingness to help and some physical capability, though not effortless or highly skilled.

Roger Thornhill.action: Maintains composure and sentimentality despite physical discomfort (hand injured and bandaged).
Roger Thornhill.assessment: Demonstrates emotional intelligence and self-control, suggesting confidence and mental resilience.
